Buses roll up the main street of the town called High St. and drop people off. There's a bus park.

value: content=The only available swimming pool in the Mbarara area is at the Lakeview Resort 3 km outside town, off Mbarara-Bushenyi Road.
content=Probably the best inter-continental food in Mbarara, nice patio area. Also serves a popular African lunch buffet.

content=This is a unique place. At day the grounds serve as a car wash, and on Friday and Saturday nights it turns into an open-air nightclub. They also serve very decent plates of BBQ pork. The DJ either plays 90's hit music (i.e. Madonna and Euro techno) mixed up with contemporary indigenous music.

There are many cheap hotels and small restaurants on Bananuka Road, around the corner from the Nakumatt supermarket.

value: directions=Two minutes walk from the Nakumatt Supermarket
content=Clean and cheap with good beds. The "Kash Hotel" next door has free Wifi.
